Machine Learning.description: A field of AI that uses data to improve performance on tasks without being explicitly programmed.

Core Idea.description: Algorithms build a model based on sample 'training data' to make predictions or decisions.

Types of Learning.description: Different approaches for how algorithms learn from data.

Supervised Learning.description: Learning from data that is already labeled.

Unsupervised Learning.description: Finding hidden patterns in unlabeled data, related to data mining.

Computer Vision.description: Enabling computers to see and interpret visual information from the world.

Predictive Analytics.description: The application of ML across business problems.
